user.title: Enhanced SunPower - Connection Setup
user.description:
Step 1: Enter your PVS IP address.

🌞 IMPORTANT: Setup during daylight hours recommended for proper validation.

⚠️ PVS Protection: 10-second minimum polling interval (20s for battery systems). More aggressive polling = higher CPU usage & larger databases.

data_description.polling_interval: How often to poll PVS (10-3600 seconds, 20s minimum for battery). Note: PVS updates gateway sensors every poll, but meter/inverter data updates every ~5min regardless.

need_password.title: Enhanced SunPower - Authentication
need_password.description:
Step 2: Enter password for PVS authentication.

🔐 Password is the last 5 characters of your PVS serial number.

📍 Find serial number:
• Physical device: Remove PVS cover - serial on device label
• SunPower/SunStrong App: Profile → System Info → Serial Number

{serial_number}

data_description.pvs_serial_last5: Last 5 characters of PVS serial number (e.g., if serial is ABC123XYZ78901, enter 78901)

notifications.title: Enhanced SunPower - Notifications & Advanced
notifications.description:
Configure notification preferences and advanced features.

🔔 Notification Levels:
• General notifications give you 'integration is working' feedback
• Debug notifications help with troubleshooting

⚠️ Debug Notifications Warning:
• With fast polling (10-60s), debug notifications generate MANY messages
• Recommended: Use debug only for troubleshooting, disable when done

data_description.general_notifications: Polling success, system status, 'integration is working' feedback
data_description.deep_debug_notifications: Coordinator cycles, timing details, data conversion (WARNING: generates many notifications with fast polling)
data_description.overwrite_general_notifications: Prevents notification accumulation by reusing the same notification
data_description.email_notification_service: Select email notification service from your Home Assistant notify services (select service to enable emails)
data_description.email_notification_recipient: Recipient email address (required when email service selected)
data_description.flash_memory_threshold_mb: Alert when PVS flash memory drops below this amount - % for new firmware, MB for old (set to 0 to disable)
data_description.flash_wear_threshold: Alert when PVS flash wear exceeds this percentage - shows EMMC lifetime consumed (set to 0 to disable)

advanced.title: Enhanced SunPower - Advanced Settings
advanced.description:
Configure advanced Enhanced SunPower features.

🌞 Sun Elevation Guide:
• 5° = Early start (east-facing panels)
• 10° = Standard (most residential systems)
• 15° = Late start (west-facing/shaded panels)

🔔 Notification Options:
• General notifications provide 'integration is working' feedback
• Debug notifications help with troubleshooting
• Mobile notifications send critical alerts to your phone
• Email notifications send critical alerts via email

📱 Mobile Device: Select your phone/tablet for critical alerts
📧 Email Notifications: Enable critical alerts via email service

data_description.minimum_sun_elevation: Minimum degrees above horizon for solar polling (5° = early start, 10° = standard, 15° = late start)
data_description.general_notifications: Polling success, system status, 'integration is working' feedback
data_description.deep_debug_notifications: Coordinator cycles, timing details, data conversion (WARNING: generates many notifications with fast polling)
data_description.overwrite_general_notifications: Prevents notification accumulation by reusing the same notification
data_description.mobile_notifications: Send critical alerts (PVS offline, inverter failures) to your mobile device
